name: BIA Shop
details: An e-commerce platform designed to simplify shopping experiences.
description: I was responsible for developing the user interface using React and integrating APIs for seamless data flow.
technicalDetails: Built responsive UI components using React and Tailwind CSS
Integrated RESTful APIs for product and order management
Created dynamic product filtering and search functionality
challenges: Optimizing performance for large product catalogs

name: BIA ( Bodhisattvas In Action)
details: A business automation platform for efficient workflow management.
description: I developed reusable components, optimized performance, and implemented responsive designs using Tailwind CSS.
technicalDetails: Developed reusable React components using TypeScript
Implemented state management with React Context
Created custom hooks for business logic
Built responsive layouts using Tailwind CSS

name: Korifi B2B
details: A B2B marketplace connecting suppliers and buyers.
description: Built dynamic UI components and collaborated with backend developers for smooth API integration.
technicalDetails: Built dynamic forms using React Hook Form
Integrated with REST and GraphQL APIs

name: Mandala AgriFresh
details: A platform for promoting fresh produce and agribusiness solutions.
description: Developed a responsive and visually appealing interface to showcase products effectively.
technicalDetails: Developed responsive layouts with CSS Grid and Flexbox
Implemented image optimization and lazy loading

name: Ohayo Sushi
details: A sushi restaurant website with online ordering features.
description: Implemented interactive menus, order forms, and animations to enhance user engagement.

name: Centralized Blockchain Based Banking Transactions using Digital Currency
details: A blockchain-based system for centralized banking transactions.
description: Developed a secure blockchain infrastructure and a user-friendly web interface for transactions.

name: Digital Certificate Verification System Using Blockchain
details: A distributed version control system for efficient collaboration.
description: Designed and implemented backend logic for managing distributed repositories.
technicalDetails: Used IPFS for decentralized certificate storage

name: Quick DevTools
details: A collection of helpful tools for developers to streamline their workflow.
description: Designed and implemented a suite of web-based tools to assist developers in tasks such as password generation, JSON formatting, type identification, URL encoding, and Base64 conversion.
technicalDetails: Developed using Next.js for server-side rendering and React for dynamic user interfaces.
Implemented TypeScript for type safety and improved code maintainability.
Styled the application using Tailwind CSS for responsive and modern design.
Deployed the application on Netlify for continuous deployment and hosting.
Integrated various utility libraries to handle specific tasks like JSON formatting and Base64 conversion.
keyFeatures: Password Generator: Create strong and secure passwords.
JSON Formatter: Beautify and validate JSON data.
Type Identifier: Determine data types quickly.
URL Encoder: Encode and decode URLs efficiently.
Base64 Converter: Convert data to and from Base64 encoding.
challenges: Ensuring the accuracy and reliability of each tool's functionality.
Designing a cohesive and intuitive user interface for multiple tools.
Managing state and performance optimization across various components.
Implementing security measures to prevent potential vulnerabilities.
Maintaining scalability for adding future tools and features.
